meanings.definition: Raunchier: showing or involving a lot of sexual activity in a way that is considered improper or offensive
meanings.sent1: The movie had raunchier scenes than I expected.
meanings.sent2: Some people find certain jokes raunchier than others.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's raunchier jokes made the audience blush.
meanings.sent4: Her choice of words was raunchier than usual, catching everyone off guard.
meanings.sent5: The party had a raunchier atmosphere as the night went on.

meanings.definition: Raunchier: having a strong and unpleasant taste or smell
meanings.sent1: The cheese had a raunchier smell than the rest of the fridge.
meanings.sent2: The garbage can was getting raunchier by the day.
meanings.sent3: The old socks in the gym locker had a raunchier smell than a skunk.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had a raunchier odor than anything I had ever encountered.
meanings.sent5: The alley behind the restaurant had a raunchier stench than usual.

meanings.sent1: The raunchier side of the city was not a place you'd want to visit at night.
meanings.sent2: The raunchier parts of the beach were littered with trash.
meanings.sent3: The raunchier alleyways were avoided by the locals.
meanings.sent4: The raunchier sections of the park were left untouched by visitors.
meanings.sent5: The raunchier areas of the town were in need of a good cleaning.
